flawed_nl_solution:
The lawyer worked 50*2=<<50*2=1000>>1000 hours out of court
So he worked 1000+50=<<1000+50=1050>>1050 hours total
That means the hourly time cost 1050*100=$<<1050*100=105000>>105000
Adding the upfront cost it was 105000+1000=$<<105000+1000=106000>>106000
His brother paid half so he paid 106000/2=$<<106000/2=53000>>53000
#### 53000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
